main event: A bright white object was sighted in the sky over Australia, which turned a brighter green color and then burned out in a line of orange sparks.
interesting points: The object was traveling at high speed in a southward direction, approximately 22 degrees above the horizon.
There was a light cloud cover, making it unclear whether the burnout occurred over or under the clouds.
The sighting was reported by many people in the Brisbane area, as well as from a location called Dalby.
The report mentions that the object was not a conventional aircraft.
The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes.
sighted object: a bright white object that turned green and burned out in a line of orange sparks
witnesses: RAAF officer and his son, as well as many people in the Brisbane and Dalby areas
